text: That works but I would need to create a new template for a one-off page and it's just extra work and confusing for people who aren't developers. If I could just add a custom class to a section I could style native HS modules for that section only really quickly instead of having to create a new template for that section. I would also be able to save that section and re-order where it appears without having to do to much.
It sounds like a custom module that applies the custom class to the section with JS might best fit your needs, until HubSpots provides some other easier way to apply custom classes

That is how I have been getting by. Just feels like extra steps to do something simple. I have a repo of custom modules that are just HS modules with the ability to add a class, or just custom modules that are entire sections that could have been made using native modules
